hero.title: Te conectamos a una nueva forma de explorar, innovar y transformar el turismo.

partners.title: Connect to our partner network
partners.description: By integrating your operation with PASS, you gain access to a collaborative environment where products and services can be distributed efficiently and strategically. Expand your target audience, increase your market presence, and offer complete experiences that delight customers.

virtual_store.title: Tienda Virtual B2C
virtual_store.description: Proporcione a sus clientes una experiencia de reserva intuitiva y sin complicaciones. Con nuestro motor de reservas B2C, puede atraer y convertir más clientes sin pagar comisiones por cada reserva.
virtual_store.interface_alt: Interfaz de reservas mostrando una cabaña amarilla
